overview: Blonde beauties Abigaile Johnson and Ella Milano have mischief on their minds when they strip down to their panties and corner their friend Giovanni in the hallway. • Alexis Adams and Scarlet Red are already in bed making out and flirting when they are joined by Van Wylde whose only wish is to make both of these lovely girls cum. • Megan Rain and Marley Brinx are getting ready for a night of seduction. • Standing outside taking in the stunning views of Hollywood and exchanging sweet kisses, Kelly Surfer and Trinity StClair are not immune to the magic of the moment.
tagline: Are you man enough to handle two women at once?
title: Double Trouble
